itemInfo.itemDesc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Melted Tin Shard. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Beginner.

※ Find Flaviano in Heidel and complete the Pure Water for an Experiment Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Apprentice Level 4 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Tin Ore
item.desc: A natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Khuruto Cave, Rhutum Outstation, and Behr Riverhead. It can be directly obtained from Ore containing Tin.

item.name: Melted Tin Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Tin Ore.

item.name: Melted Tin Shard
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Tin Ore.

item.name: Calpheon Ferry Decoration
item.desc:
A Calpheon decoration that can be attached to a ferry. It lowers the chance of breaking trade items.
When 3 or more set items are equipped:
Movement Speed +2%
Weight Limit +100LT
- Mounts Usable: Ferry
It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Tin Candelabra with Four Candles
item.desc: A tin candelabra with 4 candles attached.

item.name: Pure Tin Crystal
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be obtained by Heating Metal Solvent acquired by Alchemy and Tin Ingots. It requires the knowledge of Heating: Skilled.

※ Find Vatudun in Keplan and complete the Materials for Skills Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the related Quest, achieve Gathering Professional Level 10 and Processing Professional Level 5. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Tin Decorated Beeswax Chandelier (Fluorescent)
item.desc: A fluorescent wax chandelier decorated with tin.
